properties.name: Automatic Updates
properties.tagline: Take back full control of WordPress automatic updates

sections.title: Automatic Updates For WordPress Components
summary: Purpose - Control how automatic updates for each WordPress component is handled.
Recommendation - You should at least allow minor updates for the WordPress core.

sections.title: Auto-Update Options
sections.summary: Purpose - Make adjustments to how automatic updates are handled on your site.

sections.title: Enable Module: Automatic Updates
summary: Purpose - Automatic Updates lets you manage the WordPress automatic updates engine so you choose what exactly gets updated automatically.
Recommendation - Keep the Automatic Updates feature turned on.

options.name: Enable Automatic Updates
options.summary: Enable (or Disable) The Automatic Updates module
options.description: Un-Checking this option will completely disable the Automatic Updates module

options.name: Disable All
options.description: When selected, regardless of any other settings, all WordPress automatic updates on this site will be completely disabled!

options.name: WordPress Core Updates
options.summary: Decide how the WordPress Core will automatically update, if at all
options.description: At least automatically upgrading minor versions is recommended (and is the WordPress default).

options.name: Plugins
options.description: Note: Automatic updates for plugins are disabled on WordPress by default.

options.name: Themes
options.description: Note: Automatic updates for themes are disabled on WordPress by default.

options.name: Update Delay
options.summary: Delay Automatic Updates For Period Of Stability
options.description: Shield will delay upgrades until the new update has been available for the set number of days.

options.name: Auto Update Plugin
options.description: Regardless of any other settings, automatically update the Shield plugin.

options.name: Send Report Email
options.summary: Send email notices after automatic updates
options.description: You can turn on/off email notices from automatic updates by un/checking this box.

options.name: Report Email Address
options.summary: Where to send upgrade notification reports
options.description: If this is empty, it will default to the Site Admin email address
